name: Triangle In Time
description:
Triangle in Time is a small game made with gb studio!

It hasn't a lot of features and it's kinda short but I put story in it so it's not a walking simulator :D

Hope you enjoy.

(You need a game boy emulator)

If you find any bug contact me at @M4nuelig0XD on twitter or at M4nuelig0XD@gmail.com!
